channel.title: Something to teleport you home :)
channel.description: Hey, I was trying time and time again to create a book orr something to teleport me home and got nothing. How do i set it so if the item is read it teleports me to the co-ords I've set?

item.title: Something to teleport you home :)
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

case: ####
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("messagehere");
actionName = "[actionnamehere]";
actionTimer = ##;
setAnimation(###);
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

the case number should be the item id
etc etc
just play around with it and you should get it

Read full topic
